Langford

About

Since I was young, figuring out how things work has been one of my primary interests. Later in life, I would solve problems using calculus and advanced mathematics and also create works of original music.

In my constant journey of learning new concepts of which I thoroughly enjoy, I have found web development to be exciting. It's awesome to be able to create things that are useful and to be able to share them with the world.
